value.column_description: Amount of tokens transferred (ERC20) / id of the token transferred (ERC721). Use safe_cast for casting to NUMERIC or FLOAT64

block_hash.column_description: Hash of the block where this transfer was in

log_index.column_description: Log index in the transaction receipt

block_number.column_description: Block number where this transfer was in

block_timestamp.column_description: Timestamp of the block where this transfer was in
